headline: American Water Works (AWK) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: American Water Works (AWK) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 0.96% and 11.01%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: American Water Works (AWK) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates

headline: California American Water to Host Supplier Diversity Showcase
summary: PACIFIC GROVE, Calif., April 30, 2025--California American Water will be hosting its annual Supplier Diversity Showcase on May 6th, 2025. The event connects suppliers and provides education and increased awareness of California-American Water’s commitment to a robust supply chain.

raw.headline: California American Water to Host Supplier Diversity Showcase

headline: American Water Works: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: CAMDEN, N.J. (AP) — American Water Works (AWK) on Wednesday reported first-quarter profit of $205 million. On a per-share basis, the Camden, New Jersey-based company said it had net income of $1.05. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: American Water Works: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: CAMDEN, N.J. (AP) — American Water Works (AWK) on Wednesday reported first-quarter profit of $205 million. On a per-share basis, the Camden, New Jersey-based company said it had net income of $1.05. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

headline: AMERICAN WATER REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2025 RESULTS ON TRACK
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., April 30, 2025--American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE: AWK) today reported results for the quarter ended March 31, 2025, of $1.05 per share, compared to $0.95 per share for the same quarter in 2024.

headline: Why American Water Works (AWK) is a Great Dividend Stock Right Now
summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does American Water Works (AWK) have what it takes? Let's find out.

headline: American Water Announces Dividend Increase
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., April 30, 2025--American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE: AWK) announced that its board of directors today declared a quarterly cash dividend payment of $0.8275 per share of common stock, an increase of 8.2 percent.
